## User Story
As an <user/persona>, I want to <action>, so that <benefit>.

## Business Requirements
- Describe key expectations, behaviors, or constraints
- Mention what should happen on success/failure
- Include scope of functionality (e.g., apply to all nodes immediately)

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Action can be triggered from UI or CLI
- [ ] Change propagates to all nodes within 1 second
- [ ] Failures are logged and retried
- [ ] State is consistent across nodes
